text: The discography of Sigala, an English DJ, record producer and remixer. His debut studio album, Brighter Days, was released in September 2018. The album peaked at number fourteen on the UK Albums Chart. The album includes the singles "Easy Love", "Sweet Lovin'", "Say You Do", "Give Me Your Love", "Ain't Giving Up", "Came Here for Love", "Lullaby", "Feels Like Home", "We Don't Care" and "Just Got Paid". ==Studio albums== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
